name: Halma online
description:
:: Halma supports 24 languages ::

- 3 boards: 3x3, 6x6, 15x15
- 3 difficulty levels
- online play

Halma, aka Chinese Checkers is a well-known, classic board game. Move all your pieces into the diagonally opposite camp and win!

Main features:
-1 Player mode: play against your device
-2 Player mode: play with a friend on one device
-Online mode: challenge your friends or random opponents via Game Center

Choose your favourite board size and difficulty level!
You can choose from one of three available boards - 6x6, more difficult 7x7 and the most challenging 8x8.
There are three difficulty levels, choose the right one for your skill!
